org.gatein.api.portal
Interface Formatted

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseId, PageId, SiteId
public interface Formatted

Interface to represent something that supports Formatter.format(String, Object...) where by supplying the formatted arguments (the Object array) one can customize the format of an object implementing this interface.

Author:
Nick Scavelli

Nested Class Summary
static interface Formatted.Adapter
          An adapter which can be used to adapt an argument which will be used in the formatting method as apposed to the original value produced by the Formatted implementation.
 
Method Summary
 Object[] getFormatArguments()
          The arguments which can be formatted.
 Object[] getFormatArguments(Formatted.Adapter adapter)
          The arguments which can be formatted.
 

Method Detail

getFormatArguments

Object[] getFormatArguments()
The arguments which can be formatted. This should be documented by the implementing class on how many and which arguments are formatted.

Returns:
the formatter arguments

getFormatArguments

Object[] getFormatArguments(Formatted.Adapter adapter)
The arguments which can be formatted. This should be documented by the implementing class on how many and which arguments are formatted.

Parameters:
adapter - an adapter which can 'adapt' the argument to be used in the format method as apposed to the original.
Returns:
the formatter arguments
